Description:
PN Suitable and sufficient steps have not been taken to prevent a fall from the leading edge to the adjacent property by using working platforms, guardrails or barriers. 
PN Effective steps have not been taken to ensure that electrical equipment is secure in that there is an unsecured trailing double socket. 
IN The welfare facilities are not sufficient to comply with Schedule 2 of CDM 2015 throughout the construction phase in that, for example, there was no running warm or hot water for hand washing.
